I have experiencing the following Error when attempting to run
TestSampleServlet.  I am using tomcat 3.2.1 as my
servlet engine.

and when I type the following address 

http://localhost:8080/test/ServletTestRunner?suite=TestSampleServlet

I get the following error.

 
HTTP Status 500 -
